inn1.comm: starts off with a delivery outside the off stump, left alone through to the keeper.
gets behind a back of a length delivery and defends square of the wicket.
off the pad and the ball goes to the onside as Tamim looks to play to the leg side.
plays and misses outside the off stump as the ball moves away.
goes down the leg side, signaled a wide.
another wide this time outside the off stump.
turns it down to fine leg for a single.
full and on the pads, plays around it and gets hit low on the pad, appeal turned down.
starts off with a full delivery wide outside the off stump.
works it from the middle stump and plays it through midwicket.
another wide delivery outside the off stump.
wide outside the off stump, goes after it and misses.
fuller delivery mistimed to mid-off.
defended to the off side, a good tight delivery.
too wide once again, pitches and moves away.
down the leg side, another wide.
good length delivery outside the off stump, moves forward and lets it go through to the keeper.
full delivery driven back to the bowler.
back of a length delivery angled across, left alone.
off the pad and down to fine leg for a leg bye.
short and wide outside the off stump, lets it go.
lovely delivery pitches on a good length outside the off stump and moves away, Nazimuddin goes for a drive and gets the outside edge through to Arshad at second slip. First strike for UAE and Zahid.
that was close to the off stump as Ashraful gets an inside edge down to fine leg.
good tight delivery on the stumps and Ashraful blocks to the onside and takes off for a quick single.
good length delivery defended to the off side.
wide outside the off stump and Ashraful cuts hard behind point to the deep.
moves forward and pushes to mid-off.
good line from Alhasmi angled across, lets it go.
looking to work it through the onside, misses the bat and off the thigh pad the ball rolls alongside the track on the onside.
moves forward to a good length delivery and defends with an angled bat to backward point.
looking to drive and gets a thickish edge through midwicket.
good length delivery outside the off stump and in the corridor, lets it go.
down the leg side.
another inside edge which goes past the off stump and down to the fine leg fence. Ashraful was looking to drive through the off side.
full delivery driven nicely but straight to the fielder at extra cover.
too wide outside the off stump, another wide, ninth one of the innings so far.
moves forward and slashes at the delivery past the backward point to the deep, got the bottom of the bat.
back of a length delivery, pitches and moves away, Ashraful lets it go.
slower delivery on the leg stump, off the pad and on the track.
good length delivery angled across, left alone.
a wide delivery and Tamim looking to drive through the off side, gets a thickish inside edge.
pitches and moves away as it was angled across. Tamim moves forward and plays inside the line.
another move forward and this time it looks like he is beaten.
bit wide outside the off stump as it was angled across, left alone.
moves forward and defends square of the wicket on the off side.
defended to the onside.
pushes forward and gets beaten as it moved away outside the off stump.
down the leg side, say what, another wide.
moves forward and lets the ball go outside the off stump.
moves forward and defends down the track. 123 kmph
good tight line from Zahid on the off stump, moves forward and defends to the off side.
waits for the delivery and plays it down in the gap to the left of backward point for a single.
short and wide outside the off stump, left alone.
nice shot driven through extra cover to the deep.
good length delivery defended to the off side.
moves forward and plays with an angled bat to backward point.
on the middle and leg and Ashraful works it through midwicket to the deep for couple of runs. The outfield is very slow.
left alone outside the off stump.
plays it down to thirdman for a single.
back of a length delivery defended to the off side.
short delivery and Ashraful rocks back and pulls well in the air to midwicket fence, good shot.
opens the face off the bat and plays it away from the slip fielder and down to thirdman.
nicely worked behind square leg to the deep.
cut behind point for a single.
moves forward and looks to drive through the off side, gets an inside edge down to fine leg fence.
looking to drive through the off side, gets a thickish edge back down the track.
fuller delivery driven to mid-off.
good length delivery angled across outside the off stump, lets it go.
on the pads and Tamim works it behind square leg.
moves forward and drives to cover but cannot find the gap.
bad delivery down the leg side, it was full and Tamim glances it down to fine leg fence.
moves forward and pushes to mid-off, takes off for a quick single, the throw strikes the stumps but the batsman was in.
worked to the onside.
a half-volley and Tamim needs no invitation, drives nicely past mid-on to the fence.
on the pads, tickled down to fine leg for couple more runs.
pushes in the gap at midwicket for a single.
lovely shot from Ashraful. It was overpitched outside the off stump and Ashraful puts his left foot forward and drives nicely through covers to the fence.
lovely delivery pitches on the off and middle and spins away to beat Tamim's bat.
works square of the wicket on the onside for a single.
a full toss and Ashraful cannot put it away, that surprised Ashraful, he pushes it down the track.
driven to the off side.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
defends on the front foot to extra cover.
pushes to the onside.
pushes it back down the track.
plays it down the ground to long on.
tosses it nicely outside the off stump, moves forward and drives down the ground to long off.
works it through midwicket for couple of runs.
good ball, plays it back down the track.
tosses it outside the off stump and Ashraful misses the drive, the keeper collects the ball and whips off the bails and asks for a stumping but Ashraful's feet was grounded in the crease.
driven to the off side.
waits for the ball and cuts  well in front of point to the deep.
this goes straight on with the arm outside the off stump, lets it go.
mistimes the drive back to the bowler.
moves forward and pushes at the delivery outside the off stump, gets beaten, Amjad Ali collects the ball and whips off the bails, third umpire is called for some action, the green light flashes.
cuts square of the wicket on the off side.
plays it late to the slip.
off the pad to the onside as Tamim looks to play to the onside.
defended on the front foot to the onside.
moves forward and plays behind point, the fielder in quickly prevents the single.
moves back and plays it back to the bowler.
driven down the ground to long on for a single.
moves forward and pushes it back to the bowler.
moves back and punches wide of long off for a single.
moves forward and pushes to cover, a terrible throw to the keeper.
works it square of the wicket on the onside.
moves forward and defends to cover.
works to the onside.
pushes it down to long on for a single.
defended to the off side.
moves forward and slashes it square behind the wicket on the off side to the deep.
moves forward and pushes to the onside.
nicely tossed up delivery, driven back to the bowler.
pushes down the ground to long on.
pushes to the off side.
moves forward and drives well but well fielded by Saqib as he stretches his legs to field.
cut to the sweeper cover for a single.
a touch short from Saqib, pushes it back to the bowler.
waits for the delivery and works it square of the wicket on the onside.
moves forward and plays square of the wicket on the off side.
tossed up nicely, played back to the bowler.
moves forward and plays behind point to the deep.
pushes to the onside.
slower from Silva, Ashraful cuts and misses.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
works through midwicket for a single.
plays it down the track.
defended on the front foot down the track.
pushes to the onside.
softly pushes down the ground to long on.
slowly tossed up outside the off stump, driven down the ground to long off.
runs it down to short thirdman.
paddles it around to fine leg for couple of runs.
moves back and punches through the off side to the sweeper for a single.
wonderful flight from Silva, driven down the ground to long off.
driven once again down the ground to long on.
moves forward and pushes down the ground to long off.
a  slow turner from Saqib, moves forward and defends on the track.
plays with the spin and drives down the ground to long on.
a bad delivery on the pads, tickles it nicely to fine leg.
waits for it and plays it to the fielder at deep square leg for a single.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long off.
spins down the leg side, appeal for a catch turned down and the umpire signals a wide.
pushes square of the wicket on the onside.
pushes to the onside and takes off for a quick single.
tossed up delivery and Ashraful plays an inside out shot in the air to the extra cover fence, brings up his 50! His 15th ODI fifty.
driven to the sweeper cover for a single.
moves forward and pushes down the ground to long on.
plays it back to the bowler.
moves forward and defends to the onside.
pushes back to the bowler.
run out! Disaster for bangladesh as Tamim goes. Cuts it down to thirdman and the throw comes in from the deep, Amjad Ali collects a wide throw and then dives to remove the stumps to run out Tamim.
gets off the mark with a single down the ground to long off.
pushes to the off side.
moves forward and pushes to extra cover.
works to the onside for a quick single.
cuts to deep backward point and a wild throw gives away overthrows.
pushes to the off side.
plays it behind point to the deep and comes back for the second run as the throw comes in, referred to third umpire, the green light flashes as Ashraful is in.
dropped! Plays inside out in the air, the extra cover fielder gets some hand to it and the ball goes to the fence.
defended on the front foot.
driven to the off side, the bowler quickly follows and picks the ball and throws down the stumps, Raqibul is just in.
driven to the sweeper for a single.
pushes to the off side for a single.
comes down the track and looks to defend, off the pad to short thirdman.
drags it bit short and Raqibul cuts to deep point.
moves forward and drives it down the track.
pushes in the gap to the sweeper for a single.
works it straight to the fielder on the onside.
pushes down the ground to long off.
punches it just to the left of midwicket to the deep for a single.
moves back and drives down the ground to long off.
pushes square of the wicket on the off side for a single.
pushes it back to the bowler.
plays to the off side.
uses his feet well and to the pitch off the ball and hits it high in the air down the ground and one bounce to the long on fence.
punches on the front foot back to the bowler.
works it square of the wicket on the onside for a single.
good delivery to end the over, blocked on the front foot to the onside.
a cheeky shot from Raqibul as he looks to lap it around over the keeper, goes in the air down to fine leg.
punches it back to the bowler.
pushes in the gap to cover for a single.
plays it along the ground to the sweeper cover for a single.
cut hard but straight to the fielder at backward point.
waits for the slow turner and pushes square of the wicket on the off side.
driven down the ground to long off.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
down the wicket but not to the pitch off the ball and Raqibul adjusts well and pushes down the ground to long on.
lovely shot, makes room and plays an inside out shot over extra cover to the fence.
now Ashraful is in action, picks it up and hits it well to midwicket fence.
pushes down the ground to long on.
almost a leading edge as Ashraful looks to play to the onside.
works to the onside, the midwicket fielder does well.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long off.
punches down the ground to long off.
pushes to the onside for a single.
moves back and punches down the ground to long on.
punches it down the ground to long off.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
cuts well to deep point for couple of runs, brings up the 50 runs partnership.
hits it in the air over the fielder at extra cover to the deep.
a leading edge to covers as he looks to play to the onside.
punches it down the ground to long off.
pulls it around down the ground to long on.
driven down the ground to long off.
moves forward and punches down the ground to long off.
plays in the air, was away from the fielders on the off side.
an outside edge down to short thirdman.
played wide of the fielder at long on, the fielder gets a touch on the ropes as he fields the ball, it was referred to third umpire, signaled a boundary.
moves forward and plays to cover for a single.
pushes to short thirdman.
down the wicket and drives to long off for a single.
moves forward and defends to extra cover.
wonderful fielding in the deep, makes room and chips it over extra cover to the deep.
works it to the onside for a single.
good shot hit in the air and one bounce to the fielder at deep extra cover.
cuts well to the sweeper cover for couple of runs.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long off.
punches down the ground to long off.
cut behind point, nicely  fielded there.
driven down the track.
short outside the off stump and Ashraful chops it down to backward point.
another short delivery and Ashraful plays it late down to thirdman for a single.
nudges it down to fine leg for a single.
mistimes the drive down the ground to long on, was trying to hit on the up.
short ball pulled away in the air to deep midwicket.
short and bit slower from Zahid, Ashraful cuts and gets an under-edge onto the ground and to the keeper.
moves back and punches to extra cover.
driven down the ground to long on.
moves forward and drives to the sweeper for a single.
short ball and Raqibul misses it, fails to put away the bad ball.
slower in the air, cuts late but cannot find the gap at backward point.
moves forward and pushes to extra cover.
cut down to thirdman for a single.
moves forward and pushes to mid-off for a single.
cuts it to deep backward point for couple of runs.
driven to the sweeper cover for a single.
in the air and in the gap to the fence. Short delivery and Raqibul hooks well to midwicket fence.
pushes square of the wicket on the off side to the deep.
laps it around to fine leg for couple of runs.
punches down the ground to long on, brings up his 50! Good positive batting from Raqibul.
tossed up delivery and Ashraful mistimes the drive to the off side.
tosses it outside the off stump, hit in the air down the ground to long off.
cut to backward point.
makes room and chips it in the air to deep extra cover, the fielder takes it on the bounce.
pushes to cover and takes off for a quick single, moves onto 99.
driven down the ground to long on.

yes he gets it as he runs it down to thirdman for a single, brings up his second ODI century. Raises his bat to the few people present at the ground and then kisses the turf, well played. Also brings up the 100 runs partnership.
yorker length delivery dug out to the onside, they scamper through for a quick single.
pushes square of the wicket on the off side.
nudges it down to fine leg for a single.
tossed up delivery and Ashraful drives it down the ground to long on.
down the track and hits it high over the bowler to the deep for couple of runs.
this time he picks up the gap and hits it well wide of long on to the fence.
another good shot from Raqibul, picks out the gap once again, hits well to midwicket fence.
third boundary of the over, driven well to the extra cover fence.
works it to the onside for a single.
full toss driven down the ground to long on.
down the leg side, signaled a wide. Zahid looks a tired man.
driven along the ground straight to the fielder at extra cover.
the ball does not bounce outside the off stump as Ashraful drives and misses.
low full toss not put away, played straight to the fielder at midwicket.
driven down the ground to long on.
down the track and hits it over the bowlers head to the fence.
makes room and cuts to the sweeper cover for a single.
reverse sweep from Ashraful as he plays to short thirdman.
down the wicket and hits in the air to the cow-corner and to the fence.
laps it around to fine leg.
reverse sweep from Raqibul this time, hits it well in the gap to backward point fence.
full delivery driven to mid-off, quick single taken.
yorker squeezed out to backward point, good fielding there.
hit in the air, one bounce to the fielder at mid-off.

a good knock comes to an end. That ball was not too short for the pull, he gets a top-edge and the ball goes high in the air on the off side in front of the wicket and Amjad Ali the keeper calls for it and takes the catch.
dropped! Hit in the air down to long leg and Amjad Javed drops the catch.
down the leg side, signaled a wide.
Run out! Plays on the track and takes off for a quick single, Amjad reaches the ball first and runs out Ashraful. A wonderful knock comes to an end.
plays it back to the bowler.
driven down the ground to long off.
works it behind square leg for a single.
nice delivery, Kapali chips it in the air back to the bowler, who parries it up in the air and takes the catch.
down the leg side, signaled a wide.
driven back to the bowler.
uses his feet and works it through midwicket for couple of runs.
moves forward and punches to the off side.
yorker outside the off stump, squeezed down to thirdman for a single.
low full toss on the legs and Mortaza chips it in the air straight to the fielder at midwicket.
pushes to the onside.
dabs it down to thirdman, there was a chance for the second run, not taken.
full delivery driven down the ground to long off.
pushes to the onside for a single.
a leading edge along the ground to the off side.
pushes a bit uppishly down to long on.
once again pushes in the air, one bounce to the fielder at extra cover.
works to square leg for a single.
down the wicket and drives to long on.
laps it around to long leg just outside the circle and picks up couple of runs.
pushes straight to the fielder at extra cover.
hits it well to the cow corner and to the fence, good shot.
works it in the gap through midwicket to the deep, good throw to the bowler, who throws it to the keeper, who fails to collect the ball as it was on the bounce, both the batsmen were at the same end.
down the wicket and hits it well in the air to long off fence.
down the wicket and just checks his shot, the ball lobs up to extra cover, the fielder almost got there, it hits the cheek bone of the fielder.

sweeps and misses, Amjad Ali collects the ball and whips off the bails, he appeals and the third umpire is called into action once again, the red light flashes as Mushfiqur could not gets his feet back in time.
pushes to the off side for a single.
a leading edge to the off side.
it goes the distance, swings it high and way over the midwicket fence, wonderful strike from Dolar.
dropped! Goes for the big shot and this time mishits it high in the air to deep midwicket, where Fahad AlHasmi dives forward to drop the catch.
full toss hit in the air over the bowler to long off.
driven down the ground to long on.
down the wicket and hits it over extra cover to the deep.
hits it in the air to deep midwicket, one bounce to the fielder, coming back for the second run.
down the wicket and a very good shot as he drives wide of the fielder at long off.
looking for the pull shot but can only play it back to the bowler.

down the wicket and mistimes the shot to the onside, the throw comes in from the deep to the keeper as the batsmen were coming for the second run. Amjad Ali breaks the stumps and it is referred to the third umpire, the red light flashes.

inn2.comm: short delivery outside the off stump, goes over the top of cover to the fence.
plays with an angled bat to backward point.
plays from the crease and pushes to mid-on.
back of a length delivery defended to the off side.
once again stands in the crease and looking to force it through but cannot find the gap.
goes all the way for a maximum. Makes room and hits it well high and over the long off fence. Good start for UAE.
off the pads to the onside.
good ball, gets the inside edge past the stumps to fine leg fence.
plays and misses from the crease. It was short of a length, pitches and moves away slightly to beat the outside edge.
works it in front of square leg and Nazimuddin moves quickly and dives to make a wonderful save.
short down the leg side.
pushes past the bowler to mid-on, lot of misunderstanding between the batsmen.
pushes to mid-on.
a good bouncer and Amjad Javed gets out of the shot at the last moment.
plays and misses outside the off stump.
moves back and defends solidly to the off side.
makes room and looks to go for the big shot but can only mishit it high in the air to mid-off, where Tamim takes the catch.
pushes square of the wicket on the off side.
good length delivery pushed to mid-on.
down the leg side, signaled a wide.
pushes on the front foot to cover.
good delivery pitched up and Indika looking to drive misses the ball, the ball strikes the pad may be just outside the line.
back of a length delivery defended down on the track.
short down the leg side.
superb shot from Amjad, gets behind the delivery and punches it through covers to the fence, wonderful timing.
good length delivery defended back to the bowler.
pushes to mid-off.
drives and gets the outside edge down to thirdman.
drives on the up in the air and in the gap through covers to the fence.
drives and gets the outside edge, falls short of the first slip.
moves closer to the delivery and pushes to mid-off.
poor fielding at mid-off by Ashraful, driven well on the up.
another outside edge down to thirdman.
moves in line of the delivery and pushes square of the wicket on the off side.
bit wide outside the off stump and Amjad Ali goes after it and gets beaten.
short delivery and Amjad Ali looking to pull mistimes it down the track.
another short delivery, this time he takes it on the body as he again goes for the pull.
punches past the diving mid-off to the fence, wonderful shot with a straight bat.
pushes to mid-off.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
down the wicket and hits it in the air over midwicket to the fence.
good ball from Mortaza, Arshad Ali defends to the off side.
good short delivery and Arshad Ali takes his eye off the ball, gets into a awkward position, off the body the ball goes to fine leg.
lovely shot from Amjad Ali, drives well through midwicket to the fence, well put away.
good slower delivery to end the over, plays with an angled bat to point.
on the middle stump and Arshad Ali works it through the vacant midwicket to the deep for couple of runs.
good yorker, dug out to the onside.
defends to the onside.
down the track and drives to mid-off but cannot find the gap.
lovely shot, short delivery and Arshad Ali pulls well all along the ground through midwicket to the fence.
mistimes the shot back to the bowler, who looks to throw down the stumps but then does not release the ball.
caught! Edged and taken at first slip, moves forward and pushes at the delivery outside the of stump and gets the outside edge to Alok Kapali.
pushes at the delivery and gets the outside edge down to thirdman fence.
this time moves forward nicely and defends to the off side.
defended to the off side.
cuts and gets an under edge down to short thirdman.
defended square of the wicket on the onside.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
short delivery outside the off stump and Arshad chips down the track and looks to pull, misses it and through to Mushfiqur Rahim.
good tight delivery from Dolar, defended to the off side.
works it square behind the wicket on the onside to the deep, good running, comes back for the second run.
short delivery and Arshad Ali hooks well and keeps it down to square leg fence.
pushes it back to the bowler, who shows some aggression as he looks to throw down the stumps but then does not release the ball.
on the leg stump, defended down the track.
works it to long leg for a single.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
pushes to mid-on on the front foot.
moves back and mistimes the shot down the track.
pushes to the onside.
short delivery outside the off stump, defended with an angled bat to the off side.
good tight delivery from Dolar, defended to the off side.
a thickish edge along the ground to deep backward square leg.
goes over the top and hits through the line of the delivery, plays in front of square leg to the fence.
full delivery driven along the ground straight to the fielder at extra cover.
pushes softly to mid-on and takes off for a quick single as the throw misses the stumps.
quicker delivery outside the off stump, plays and misses.
down the track and drives to mid-on but cannot find the gap.
cuts it late behind point.
plays bit uppishly as he pushes forward.
moves forward and plays to cover.
works it to the onside.
plays with an angled bat to short thirdman.
mistimes the drive to mid-on.
sweeps well in the air to deep-square leg.
waits for the ball and works to midwicket.
moves forward and pushes square behind the wicket on the off side for a single.
full toss swept to deep-backward square leg.
driven to mid-off.
goes for the sweep and gets a top-edge which goes over the keeper to the deep.
pushes to the off side.
makes room and cuts to deep point.
moves forward and pushes to mid-on.
sweeps in the air down to long leg for a single.
nicely tossed up outside the off stump, plays with an angled bat to short thirdman.
defends with an angled bat to point.
caught! Quicker delivery outside the off stump and Saqib Ali seeing the width goes for the cut and gets the edge straight to Shahadat Hossain at short thirdman.
full toss worked through midwicket to the deep to get off the mark.
plays it back to the bowler.
works to the onside.
defended on the front foot.
moves forward and drives back down the track.
comes forward and defends with a straight bat back to the bowler.
pushes to mid-on.
pushes forward and gets the inside edge onto the pads.
quicker and touch short, defended to the onside.
works to the onside.
tossed up full outside the off stump, driven to the sweeper for a single.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long on.
off the pad to the onside.
appeal for lbw turned down as it was sliding down the leg side.
forces off the back foot to the off side.
plays late with an angled bat to backward point.
moves forward and pushes down the track.
works it square of the wicket on the onside.
sweeps but cannot find the gap past the short fine leg.
moves forward with bat and pad close together, defends to the off side.
loud appeal for a lbw turned down as the ball spins in to strike the pad, was a close thing.
moves forward and pushes to the onside.
driven down the ground to long-on.
uses his feet well and hits it high and over the long on fence for maximum.
loud appeal for lbw turned down as the ball strikes the pad in line, another close shout not given.
good shot driven nicely through extra cover to the fence.
defended to the onside.
plays square of the wicket on the onside.
moves back and forces to the off side.
skews of the outside edge to short thirdman.
driven down the ground to long on.
driven down the ground to long on.
pushes to the off side.
driven down the ground to long on.
swings it high in the air to midwicket fence.
looks to sweep, off the pad to the off side.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
moves back and punches down the ground to long off.
driven down the ground to long on.
turns it around to deep-backward square leg for a single.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long on.
nudges behind square leg for a single.
a googly from Kapali, plays with an angled bat square of the wicket on the off side.
defends to the onside.
pushes off the back foot to mid-on.
moves forward and pushes to mid-on.
moves back and plays uppishly down the ground to long on.
moves back and cuts to deep point.
pushes to cover.
pushes to mid-on.
pushes to the off side, shy at the stumps at the non-strikers end, that was close had the throw hit.
worked through midwicket.
swept to deep-backward square leg.
low full toss played to deep-midwicket.
punches down the ground to long off.
short ball pulled around to deep-midwicket for a single, that seemed to have slipped out of Kapali's hand.
works it square behind the wicket on the onside.
pushes to the onside.
moves forward and plays to cover.
pushes to the off side.
makes room and mistimes the shot to mid-off.
defends on the front foot to the off side.
stands in the crease and defends to mid-on.
swings it high in the air and in the gap at deep-midwicket. as three fielders were converging to take the catch
forces it through the off side.
moves back and plays it back to the bowler.
hits it off the back foot down the ground to long off.
turns it around square of the wicket on the onside for a single.
laps it around to fine leg for a single.
good shot, well done, sweeps well in the air behind square leg to the fence.
down the leg side.
pushes on the front foot back to the bowler.
caught! Looking to go over midwicket, Arshad Ali mishits it high in the air for Raqibul to take the catch at midwicket.
pushes it back to the bowler.
tosses it bit fuller outside the off stump, driven down the ground to long off.
spins in from outside the leg stump, strikes the pad.
pushes it down the track back to the bowler.
moves back and cuts to the sweeper cover.
googly from Kapali and Khurram Khan just keeps it out.
tossed up bit fuller and Khurram Khan hits it in the air down the ground to long off.
driven down the ground to long off.
keeps bit low, defended to the onside.
moves forward and plays softly to the off side for a quick single.
driven down the ground to long on, a slight fumble.
drives it down the ground to long on.
loud appeal for lbw turned down as the ball strikes the pad, that might have struck outside the line.
full on the legs, worked to long leg.
driven firmly along the ground to the sweeper cover for a single.
googly defended watchfully on the track.
moves back and punches down the ground to long off.
moves forward and pushes to cover for a quick single.
full toss driven down the ground to long off.
moves forward and defends to cover, slight misunderstanding but the batsman regains the crease as the direct hit misses the stumps at the non-strikers end.
driven down the ground to long on.
defended on the track.
mistimes the cut to the off side.
pushes to the onside.
punches to mid-on.
cuts well behind point to the deep.
blocked to the onside.
pushes on the front foot to extra cover.
bowled! Arm ball, the quicker delivery and Shetty looking to cut the ball misses it completely and the ball crashes into the off and middle stump.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
tosses it outside the off stump and spins away, left alone.
pitches outside the leg stump and strikes the pad, question asked, turned down by the umpire.
fuller delivery driven well through the off side to the sweeper  for a single.
off the pad and the ball goes past the stumps and behind the wicket.
pushes to mid-on.
a thickish edge to deep-backward square leg.
full delivery outside the off stump, driven well through covers to the fence.
plays and misses down the leg side.
plays it late down to thirdman.
defends with an angled bat to point.
back of a length delivery worked to deep-square leg for a single.
moves back and looks to cut through the off side, misses it and through to Mushfiqur Rahim.
moves forward and pushes to mid-off.
defended to the off side.
short ball pulled around to deep-backward square leg.
defended to the onside.
moves back and drives down the ground to long off.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
defended once again to the off side.
moves back and pushes square of the wicket on the off side.
moves forward and defends square of the wicket on the off side.
pushes square of the wicket on the off side.
pitched up delivery and Khurram Khan drives it well down the ground past the mid-on to the fence, excellent shot to bring up his 50!
works it behind square leg for couple of runs.
pushes to the onside.

plays to the onside, Amjad Javed takes off  from the non-strikers end, Ashraful picks up the ball and has a shy at the stumps, misses it and nobody is backing up, the ball goes to the fence for overthrows.
driven on the up past the diving mid-on to the fence.
short ball and Khurram Khan mishits the hook to deep-square leg.
cuts late wide of thirdman, thinking of the second run, not there as the throw comes in.
plays to the left of cover for a single.
works to the onside.
picks it up nicely and swings it high and over midwicket to the fence.
short ball cut hard behind point to the deep.
down the leg side.
strikes the pad, a loud shout for lbw turned down.
short ball hit in the air over extra cover to the deep.
a bouncer which goes way over the batsman, signaled a wide.
square driven in the air over point to the fence, that is a good shot.
slower delivery hit in the air down the ground to long off.
inside edges to the onside for a single.
caught! Back of a length delivery outside the off stump, Tauqir looking to force it through the off side gets the outside edge to Mushfiqur Rahim behind the wicket.
nudged behind square leg for a single.
pushes wide of midwicket for a single.
opens the face off the bat and runs it down to thirdman for a single.
moves back and plays it down to thirdman for a single.
full toss worked through midwicket to the deep.
good bouncer and Silva ducks under it.
full delivery worked through midwicket, good running fetches the second run.
short ball pulled behind square leg.
rubbish from Dolar down the leg side.
punches it back to the bowler.
gets behind the delivery and defends with a straight bat back to the bowler.
moves back and punches to mid-off.
plays with an angled bat to point.
cut hard through point to the deep, good diving save by Raqibul there.
full delivery outside the off stump, goes after it and misses.
moves inside the line of the delivery and flicks it high in the air behind square leg to the fence.
misses the full toss outside the off stump and through to Mushfiqur behind the wicket.
full toss worked to the onside.
short delivery which does bounce much outside the off stump, left alone.
punches off the back foot to cover.
full toss swept behind square leg to the deep.
caught! Tossed up on the off stump and Silva drives in the air back to Kapli who takes the catch to his left.
defended to the onside.
beats the bat as Zahid plays forward.
lets the ball go outside the off stump.
cuts and misses outside the off stump.
defended to the off side.
caught! down the wicket and Khurram Khan hits it high in the air down the ground to long on, where Raqibul moves forward to take the catch. 100th ODI wicket for Razzaq.
pushes to the onside.
slower from Razzaq, blocked on the track.
quicker delivery defended to the off side.
goes for the big shot and connects well, goes to teh midwicket fence.
pushes to the off side.
off the pad to the onside.
a big heave to the onside to deep-midwicket.
bowled! a googly from Kapali, which does not bounce and Fahad Alhasmi goes for a big heave and missed it completely, the ball crashes into the stumps.
